document_data.name: Sardyl Crownsilver
document_data.mainbody: '''Sardyl Crownsilver''' was an apprentice of [[Vangerdahast]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]], also his scribe and messenger.
document_data.Description: She was curvaceous but slender, tall and graceful.
document_data.Relationships: She trusted [[Vangerdahast]] thoroughly, and was in turn trusted by him.
document_data.Abilities: She did not have much in the way of guard spells, but she was graceful and quiet.{{cite book/Elminster in Hell/Hardcover 2001|78-79|5}}
document_data.History: She was Vangerdahast's scribe and messenger in [[Alturiak]] of {{yearlink|1365}},{{cite book/Elminster in Hell/Hardcover 2001|2|Realmslore}} when [[Bolifar Geldert]] went missing. She had given the man the key to the room where he was to write his report, and sought him out for Vangerdahast afterwards, when the latter's patience ran out. She was the one to discover the empty room, with no trace of Bolifar Geldert.
